text: Hi, is there a way to fetch data from HubSpot api in a certain date range or after a certain date? Currently If I want to fetch delta data, I fetch all the data and then filter it on my end, but with Activites data which increases exponentially, it has become a performance bottleneck.
search API will certainly allow for this - though, be wary of the more stringent rate limits when using that endpoint.

Hey everyone!  :orange_heart:
(and remote "hello" to people fortunately in Inbound right now!)

We're almost ready to release our HubSpot custom code generator

Hi, guys , how i can show my data similar to appcues,

Data of other app showing in contact timeline look like
<img src="<https://i.imgur.com/XfXlYnd.png>"/>

Data of my app in contact timeline look like
<img src="<https://i.imgur.com/HdPo353.png>"/>

Also you can see i have added template from
<https://i.imgur.com/9YAw9Rr.png>
but some time when i add event i don't send data into all the tokens of template some is empty , so when its empty i have to not show that column on contact timeline ,

so can you guys , guide me how i can do that ,
any guidance , support , tutorial , documenation ,
will be a great help .
<@U01QVR44MEY> <@U039S43D3NC>

```from HubSpot import HubSpot

api_client = HubSpot(access_token='mytoken')

# or set your access token later
api_client = HubSpot()
api_client.access_token = 'mytoken'

all_contacts = api_client.crm.contacts.get_all()
print(all_contacts[0])```


the error im getting is  File "c:\Users\Daniel Haycraft\Desktop\HubSpot\app.py", line 9, in <module>

please help if you can (edited)

I am having some issues creating deals using the PHP API

The <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals|documentation> example shows
```use HubSpot\Client\Crm\Deals\Model\PublicObjectId;

$to1 = new PublicObjectId([
    'id' => '101'
]);```
However, I am getting an error `Class "HubSpot\Client\Crm\Deals\Model\PublicObjectId" not found` even though I have the HubSpot API installed into my project (shown in screenshot)
